item.title: Imprint
item.description: Nico Einsidler Kohlgasse 39, 1050 Vienna, Austria I do not track you or at least I try to. If you see any tracker, please contact me at protonmail.com as nicoeinsidler. However I am using Google Fonts hosted on Google servers. I do not know how or what Google is tracking.

item.title: About
item.description:
Hi, nice to meet you! At day I’m working at IBM, at night persuing my master’s in physics at TU Wien.

You can follow me on various networks here:

  • Twitter (@NE555)
  • GitHub
  • LinkedIn

item.title: First redesign of my homepage since 2012
item.description: It’s been almost 10 years since my last homepage redesign. Well, I’ve been very busy… But it’s finally here now. For nostalgia’s sake, let’s look back on all the old revisions and designs.
